name: vanta
title: Vanta
desc: A performance-first course template for design-minded educators.
article:
Vanta is a structured, content-driven theme for publishing online courses. Designed for clarity, speed, and flexibility, it includes lessons, teachers, pricing, and blog supportâall wrapped in a clean dual-mode UI that gets out of the way so your content can lead.


  • Learn more about Vanta
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Blog Tags
  • Light and dark modes
  • Course paywall
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
